mapper.insert:
insert into `rebate` ( id, user_id, user_code, user_name, mission_id, mission_name, amount, earnings, status, create_tm, creator, modify_tm, modifior, settle_tm, settle_man, type, earnings_from, import_date) values
(#{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.missionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{record.earnings,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{record.createTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.modifyTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.modifior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.settleTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.settleMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{record.earningsFrom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.importDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select sum(earnings) from rebate where earnings_from = #{earningsFrom,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id = #{userId};
